infractions.Violation Summary: Camp Director fails to conduct inspection of fire protection facilities and equipment

violations.Violation Summary: Each camper is not under immediate visual observation and verbal contact with counselors during all activities
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Gasoline kerosene and other inflamables is not properly labeled stored and used
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Health Director not qualified MD Nurse EMT Health Director not on site at overnight camp not available to summer day and traveling camps Assistant was not designated where required
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Fire drills are not conducted within first 48 hours of session and periodically thereafter Drill log not maintained and available for inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations
